Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, dh-sequence-sphinxdoc <!nodoc>, help2man, python3-all, python3-setuptools, python3-hypothesis <!nocheck>, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-pytest-cov <!nocheck>, python3-pytest-xdist <!nocheck>, python3-sphinx <!nodoc>
Description: Python library to handle SRT subtitle files srt is a tiny but featureful Python library for parsing, modifying, and composing SRT subtitle files. It has a very robust parser that can deal with many broken SRT files, and needs no dependencies beyond the Python Standard Library.
Package-List: python-srt-doc deb doc optional arch=all python3-srt deb python optional arch=all
